favoriteCard.name: Prince
favoriteCard.description: Don't let the little pony fool you. Once the Prince gets a running start, you WILL be trampled. Deals double damage once he gets charging.

currentDeck.name: Dark Prince
currentDeck.description: The Dark Prince deals area damage and lets his spiked club do the talking for him - because when he does talk, it sounds like he has a bucket on his head.

currentDeck.name: Goblin Gang
currentDeck.description: Spawns five Goblins - three with knives, two with spears - at a discounted Elixir cost. It's like a Goblin Value Pack!

currentDeck.name: Prince
currentDeck.description: Don't let the little pony fool you. Once the Prince gets a running start, you WILL be trampled. Deals double damage once he gets charging.

currentDeck.name: Princess
currentDeck.description: This stunning Princess shoots flaming arrows from long range. If you're feeling warm feelings towards her, it's probably because you're on fire.

currentDeck.name: Bats
currentDeck.description: Spawns a handful of tiny flying creatures with big ears. Having big ears doesn't mean they're good listeners.

currentDeck.name: Dart Goblin
currentDeck.description: Runs fast, shoots far and chews gum. How does he blow darts with a mouth full of gum? Years of didgeridoo lessons.

currentDeck.name: Zap
currentDeck.description: Zaps enemies, briefly stunning them and dealing damage inside a small radius. Reduced damage to Crown Towers.

currentDeck.name: Miner
currentDeck.description: The Miner can burrow his way underground and appear anywhere in the Arena. It's not magic, it's a shovel.

cards.name: Rocket
cards.description: Deals high damage to a small area. Looks really awesome doing it. Reduced damage to Crown Towers.

cards.name: Goblin Barrel
cards.description: Spawns three Goblins anywhere in the Arena. It's going to be a thrilling ride, boys!

cards.name: Hunter
cards.description: He deals BIG damage up close - not so much at range. What he lacks in accuracy, he makes up for with his impressively bushy eyebrows.

cards.name: Poison
cards.description: Covers the area in a deadly toxin, damaging enemy troops and buildings over time. Yet somehow leaves the grass green and healthy. Go figure!

cards.name: Balloon
cards.description: As pretty as they are, you won't want a parade of THESE balloons showing up on the horizon. Drops powerful bombs and when shot down, crashes dealing area damage.

cards.name: Skeleton Army
cards.description: Spawns an army of Skeletons. Meet Larry and his friends Harry, Gerry, Terry, Mary, etc.

cards.name: Hog Rider
cards.description: Fast melee troop that targets buildings and can jump over the river. He followed the echoing call of "Hog Riderrrrr" all the way through the Arena doors.

cards.name: Heal
cards.description: Heal your troops to keep them in the fight! Friendly troops are healed over time while in the target area. Doesn't affect buildings.

cards.name: Mini P.E.K.K.A
cards.description: The Arena is a certified butterfly-free zone. No distractions for P.E.K.K.A, only destruction.

cards.name: Lumberjack
cards.description: He chops trees by day and hunts The Log by night. His bottle of Rage spills everywhere when he dies.

cards.name: Witch
cards.description: Summons Skeletons, shoots destructo beams, has glowing pink eyes that unfortunately don't shoot lasers.

cards.name: Ice Spirit
cards.description: Spawns one lively little Ice Spirit to freeze a group of enemies. Stay frosty.

cards.name: Rage
cards.description: Increases troop movement and attack speed. Buildings attack faster and summon troops quicker, too. Chaaaarge!

cards.name: Golem
cards.description: Slow but durable, only attacks buildings. When destroyed, explosively splits into two Golemites and deals area damage!

cards.name: Cannon Cart
cards.description: A Cannon on wheels?! Bet they won't see that coming! Once you break its shield, it becomes a Cannon not on wheels.

cards.name: X-Bow
cards.description: Nice tower you got there. Would be a shame if this X-Bow whittled it down from this side of the Arena...

cards.name: Barbarian Hut
cards.description: Troop building that periodically deploys Barbarians to fight the enemy. Time to make the Barbarians.

cards.name: Bomb Tower
cards.description: Defensive building that houses a Bomber. Deals area damage to anything dumb enough to stand near it.

cards.name: Elite Barbarians
cards.description: Spawns a pair of leveled up Barbarians. They're like regular Barbarians, only harder, better, faster and stronger.

cards.name: Magic Archer
cards.description: Not quite a Wizard, nor an Archer - he shoots a magic arrow that passes through and damages all enemies in its path. It's not a trick, it's magic!

cards.name: Tesla
cards.description: Defensive building. Whenever it's not zapping the enemy, the power of Electrickery is best kept grounded.

cards.name: Arrows
cards.description: Arrows pepper a large area, damaging all enemies hit. Reduced damage to Crown Towers.

cards.name: Wizard
cards.description: The most awesome man to ever set foot in the arena, the Wizard will blow you away with his handsomeness... and/or fireballs.

cards.name: Cannon
cards.description: Defensive building. Shoots cannonballs with deadly effect, but cannot target flying troops.

cards.name: Fireball
cards.description: Annnnnd... Fireball. Incinerates a small area, dealing high damage. Reduced damage to Crown Towers.

cards.name: Bomber
cards.description: Small, lightly protected skeleton that throws bombs. Deals area damage that can wipe out a swarm of enemies.

cards.name: Royal Ghost
cards.description: He drifts invisibly through the Arena until he's startled by an enemy... then he attacks! Then he's invisible again! Zzzz.

cards.name: Clone
cards.description: Duplicates all friendly troops in the target area. Cloned troops are fragile, but pack the same punch as the original! Doesn't affect buildings.

cards.name: Zappies
cards.description: Spawns a pack of miniature Zap machines. Who controls them...? Only the Master Builder knows.

cards.name: Freeze
cards.description: Freezes troops and buildings, making them unable to move or attack. Everybody chill.

cards.name: Lightning
cards.description: Bolts of lightning damage and stun up to three enemy troops or buildings with the most hitpoints in the target area. Reduced damage to Crown Towers.

cards.name: Sparky
cards.description: Sparky slowly charges up, then unloads MASSIVE area damage. Overkill isn't in her vocabulary.

cards.name: Mirror
cards.description: Mirrors your last card played for +1 Elixir.

cards.name: Giant Skeleton
cards.description: The bigger the skeleton, the bigger the bomb. Carries a bomb that blows up when the Giant Skeleton dies.

cards.name: Three Musketeers
cards.description: Trio of powerful, independent markswomen, fighting for justice and honor. Disrespecting them would not be just a mistake, it would be a cardinal sin!

cards.name: Fire Spirits
cards.description: These three Fire Spirits are on a kamikaze mission to give you a warm hug. It'd be adorable if they weren't on fire.

cards.name: Ice Golem
cards.description: He's tough, targets buildings and explodes when destroyed, slowing nearby enemies. Made entirely out of ice... or is he?! Yes.

cards.name: Goblin Hut
cards.description: Building that spawns Spear Goblins. But don't look inside. You don't want to see how they are made.

cards.name: Ice Wizard
cards.description: This chill caster throws ice shards that slow down enemies' movement and attack speed. Despite being freezing cold, he has a handlebar mustache that's too hot for TV.

cards.name: Elixir Collector
cards.description: You gotta spend Elixir to make Elixir.

cards.name: Archers
cards.description: A pair of lightly armored ranged attackers. They'll help you take down ground and air units, but you're on your own with hair coloring advice.

cards.name: Musketeer
cards.description: Don't be fooled by her delicately coiffed hair, the Musketeer is a mean shot with her trusty boomstick.

cards.name: Flying Machine
cards.description: The Master Builder has sent his first contraption to the Arena! It's a fast and fun flying machine, but fragile!

cards.name: Valkyrie
cards.description: Tough melee fighter, deals area damage around her. Swarm or horde, no problem! She can take them all out with a few spins.

cards.name: Lava Hound
cards.description: The Lava Hound is a majestic flying beast that attacks buildings. The Lava Pups are less majestic angry babies that attack anything.

cards.name: Bowler
cards.description: This big blue dude digs the simple things in life - Dark Elixir drinks and throwing rocks. His massive boulders roll through their target, hitting everything behind for a strike!

cards.name: Battle Ram
cards.description: Two Barbarians holding a big log charge at the nearest building, dealing significant damage if they connect; then they go to town with their swords!

cards.name: Skeletons
cards.description: Three fast, very weak melee fighters. Surround your enemies with this pile of bones!

cards.name: Furnace
cards.description: The Furnace spawns two Fire Spirits at a time. It also makes great brick-oven pancakes.

cards.name: Tornado
cards.description: Drags enemy troops to its center while dealing damage over time, just like a magnet. A big, swirling, Tornado-y magnet. Doesn't affect buildings.

cards.name: Mortar
cards.description: Defensive building with a long range. Shoots exploding boulders that deal area damage. Cannot shoot at targets that get very close!

cards.name: Royal Giant
cards.description: Destroying enemy buildings with his massive cannon is his job; making a raggedy blond beard look good is his passion.

cards.name: Skeleton Barrel
cards.description: It's a Skeleton party in the sky, until all the balloons pop... then it's a Skeleton party on the ground!

cards.name: Goblins
cards.description: Three fast, unarmored melee attackers. Small, fast, green and mean!

cards.name: Minions
cards.description: Three fast, unarmored flying attackers. Roses are red, minions are blue, they can fly, and will crush you!

cards.name: Guards
cards.description: Three ruthless bone brothers with shields. Knock off their shields and all that's left are three ruthless bone brothers.

cards.name: Spear Goblins
cards.description: Three unarmored ranged attackers. Who the heck taught these guys to throw spears!?! Who thought that was a good idea?!

cards.name: P.E.K.K.A
cards.description: A heavily armored, slow melee fighter. Swings from the hip but packs a huge punch.

cards.name: Tombstone
cards.description: Troop building that periodically deploys Skeletons to fight the enemy. When destroyed, spawns 4 Skeletons. Creepy!

cards.name: The Log
cards.description: A spilt bottle of Rage turned an innocent tree trunk into "The Log". Now, it seeks revenge by crushing anything in its path!

cards.name: Mega Minion
cards.description: Flying, armored and powerful. What could be its weakness?! Cupcakes.

cards.name: Graveyard
cards.description: Surprise! It's a party. A Skeleton party, anywhere in the Arena. Yay!

cards.name: Mega Knight
cards.description: He lands with the force of 1,000 mustaches, then jumps from one foe to the next dealing huge area damage. Stand aside!

cards.name: Night Witch
cards.description: Summons Bats to do her bidding, even after death! If you get too close, she isn't afraid of pitching in with her mean-looking battle staff.

cards.name: Inferno Dragon
cards.description: Shoots a focused beam of fire that increases in damage over time. Wears a helmet because flying can be dangerous.

cards.name: Giant
cards.description: Slow but durable, only attacks buildings. A real one-man wrecking crew!

cards.name: Bandit
cards.description: The Bandit dashes to her target and delivers an extra big hit! While dashing, she can't be touched. The mask keeps her identity safe... and gives her bonus cool points!

cards.name: Knight
cards.description: A tough melee fighter. The Barbarian's handsome, cultured cousin. Rumor has it that he was knighted based on the sheer awesomeness of his mustache alone.

cards.name: Minion Horde
cards.description: Six fast, unarmored flying attackers. Three's a crowd, six is a horde!

cards.name: Electro Wizard
cards.description: He lands with a "POW!", stuns nearby enemies and shoots lightning with both hands! What a show off.

cards.name: Baby Dragon
cards.description: Flying troop that deals area damage. Baby dragons hatch cute, hungry and ready for a barbeque.

cards.name: Inferno Tower
cards.description: Defensive building, roasts targets for damage that increases over time. Burns through even the biggest and toughest enemies!

cards.name: Barbarians
cards.description: A horde of melee attackers with mean mustaches and even meaner tempers.

cards.name: Executioner
cards.description: He throws his axe like a boomerang, striking all enemies on the way out AND back. It's a miracle he doesn't lose an arm.

cards.name: Barbarian Barrel
cards.description: It rolls, knocks back and damages anything in the way - then breaks and out pops a Barbarian! How did he get inside?!

cards.name: Dark Prince
cards.description: The Dark Prince deals area damage and lets his spiked club do the talking for him - because when he does talk, it sounds like he has a bucket on his head.

cards.name: Goblin Gang
cards.description: Spawns five Goblins - three with knives, two with spears - at a discounted Elixir cost. It's like a Goblin Value Pack!

cards.name: Prince
cards.description: Don't let the little pony fool you. Once the Prince gets a running start, you WILL be trampled. Deals double damage once he gets charging.

cards.name: Princess
cards.description: This stunning Princess shoots flaming arrows from long range. If you're feeling warm feelings towards her, it's probably because you're on fire.

cards.name: Bats
cards.description: Spawns a handful of tiny flying creatures with big ears. Having big ears doesn't mean they're good listeners.

cards.name: Dart Goblin
cards.description: Runs fast, shoots far and chews gum. How does he blow darts with a mouth full of gum? Years of didgeridoo lessons.

cards.name: Zap
cards.description: Zaps enemies, briefly stunning them and dealing damage inside a small radius. Reduced damage to Crown Towers.

cards.name: Miner
cards.description: The Miner can burrow his way underground and appear anywhere in the Arena. It's not magic, it's a shovel.

achievements.name: Challenge Streak
achievements.info: Get 12 wins in a single challenge

achievements.name: Special Challenge
achievements.info: Participate in 5 unique Special Event Challenges
